name: Abyss Dive
description:
Plunging into the waters of the ocean, the main character was not yet aware of all the dangers that lurk in the depths of the world's oceans, but fortunately he still has a harpoon that will save him more than once, the air is limited, and therefore you need to replenish air supplies in time.

Abyss Dive is a 2D side-view game where the player as a diver explores the ocean and with the help of his harpoon, can break air shells, fend off underwater monsters, and also fight his way to a mysterious treasure!

Game Features:
- Visual style
- Lots of levels
- Diversity
